dublinCore.dc:title: 87 HR 6362 IH: McIntire-Stennis Act District of Columbia Equality Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill
Referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend Public Law 87–788 (commonly known as the McIntire-Stennis Cooperative Forestry Act; 16 U.S.C. 582a–7) to provide for equal treatment of the District of Columbia with respect to funds made available under that Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the McIntire-Stennis Act District of Columbia Equality Act.

section.header: Inclusion of District of Columbia for purposes of funding under McIntire-Stennis Cooperative Forestry Act
section.text: Section 8 of Public Law 87–788 (commonly known as the McIntire-Stennis Cooperative Forestry Act; 16 U.S.C. 582a–7) is amended by inserting the District of Columbia, after include.
